title: Holding Onto A Great Company Culture: Johnson Tractor 2012 Dealership of the Year

tasks.task: Grow a dynamic company in the equipment dealer market for 30 years.
Maintain a hardworking and committed work culture, especially during busy seasons.
subtasks: Ensure employees are well-rested despite hard work.
Surround oneself with committed and adaptable employees.
Promote a team approach and mutual learning among employees.

tasks.task: Operate in a small community in the Pacific Northwest.
subtasks: Maintain a flexible schedule to accommodate family events and commitments.
